article_metadata.news-keywords: Thunder Valley casino, indian compacts, Jerry Brown, sovereignty
article_metadata.description: The Legislature has ratified a compact authorizing the United Auburn Indian Community to operate as many as 3,500 slot machines at its lucrative Thunder Valley casino for the next 25 years.
article_metadata.title: Casino deal is good enough, given constraints | The Sacramento Bee
